description: I am in the (rather fortunate) position that academic approaches to nerdy topics is extremely “on brand” – and that I have the resources to support that as a throughline alongside more serious academic research. All of which is to say I got sent the call for submissions for the first ever Warhammer-focused conference about […]
title: The Road to Heidelberg: The Inaugural Warhammer Conference

description: Welcome to Competitive Innovations, our weekly feature for a number of game lines across the tabletop wargame space. Each week our army list and tactics experts canvass the top tournaments for their game of specialty, looking at the week’s top match-ups and how they played out on the tabletop to let you know what’s hot, […]
title: [AOS] Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms: The More Things Change…

description: When my Lorcana journey first began, my chief opponent – and archnemesis – was my daughter. Right out of the gate, she picked up on a strategy that is actually kind of hard-coded into Lorcana’s design – extreme aggro. She wasted no time like I did on trying to concoct combo-heavy decks or clever ideas. […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #38 – Be Aggressive!

description: We look at the changes to the non-Space Marine Imperium factions in the Q4 2024 Balance Update, and talk about how they've changed and what it means for the competitive meta.
title: The Q4 2024 Balance Update: Imperium Factions

description: We take a deep dive into the Q4 2024 points and rules update for Warhammer 40,000 and what it did to the game's Chaos Factions - and how those factions will be affected competitively.
title: The Q4 2024 Balance Update: Chaos Factions

description: It is, once again, Balance Update time. 40K is in a fairly healthy spot, but as always there are some problem factions that have had things too good for too long, and a few teething issues with this year’s new mission pack that need ironing out. As usual, we’re here to break down what’s changed […]
title: The Q4 2024 Balance Update: Core Changes

description: We look at the changes to the various Space Marine Chapters in the Q4 2024 Balance Update, and talk about how they've changed and what it means for the competitive meta.
title: The Q4 2024 Balance Update: Space Marines

description: It’s Q4 2024 and that means it’s time for a major shakeup to the meta with the Q4 balance update for Warhammer 40k! This time around we’re dataslate-free, instead looking at a series of points update for every faction in the game, plus some errata and FAQ items. In this article we’re looking at the […]
title: The Q4 2024 Balance Update: Xenos Factions
